title: Bug Splat

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• The purpose of this game is to discover new body parts that can be used to activate a switch.
• Record "splat!" or a squishy noise onto the switch.
• Add an image of a fly or bug onto the switch (optional).
• Move the switch around making a buzzing or fly sound.
• Move the switch next to a body part e.g. head, hand, foot and prompt the switch user to splat the bug!

tooltipText: This silly game helps find a second body part to activate a switch.
